alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 1005 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Lakeside, or over Orange Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Baymeadows, Nocatee, Durbin, Switzerland, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Doctors Inlet. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
